name: Meeting Aneidea
description:
Here is my first ever attempt at making a Visual Novel (VN). It was a personal challenge to see if I could make it through, using a low budget and Ren'py. The project still feels a bit rough around the edges, but I think I got rid of the major bugs. 

The best part is that it's ABSOLUTELY FREE! 

The main (and only) girl is kind of a half-human half spider kind of character. The story is a bit weird and dark and also very violent at times. I would say maybe 16+ as a rating? The setting would be a near future with a bit of a post-apocalyptic feel to it. It has about 18 Bad Ends and 3 Good Ends. A bonus route and Good End gets unlocked when all the 3 routes and their respective Good Ends have been seen. I could only test the PC version. 

Ok, fine, presentation of the main and only girl:


  • Name: Aneidea
  • Race: Girl-Spider something...
  • Age: Older than you...
  • Blood Type: Not Really Human...
  • Personality: Oh, you will find out soon enough...

Please leave me your (constructive) comments and enjoy!

Ahem, I think I forgot to remove the saved game data from the final built... will fix that soon... (Oops, sorry!) will work on that shortly...

Ok, so now the newest version 0.14 does not have saved games from my testing phase...

There was a bug in the Bonus Route. It should be fixed in the new version 0.16

P.S. I also have a ko-fi page... just saying... https://ko-fi.com/alexpaq
